TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] increases the rate at which your civilization generates [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT]. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]帕特农神殿[COLOR_REVERT]可提升你的文明产生[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率，特别是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。并可大量增加文化产出。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shalimar Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] provide happiness for excessive health in its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 沙利马尔花园[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]为城市的富余健康提供快乐。它还增加了这个城市创造出大艺术家的可能性。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Golden Gate Bridge[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional commerce to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]金门大桥[COLOR_REVERT]为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]科学家[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]工程师[COLOR_REVERT]专家增加了额外的商业。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Hubble Space Telescope
TEXT.Chinese: 哈勃太空望远镜

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_CULTURE] per controlled Great Wonder
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_CULTURE]每个受控的大奇迹

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lotus Temple[COLOR_REVERT] provides 1 food per non-state religion in all cities. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]莲花寺[COLOR_REVERT]在所有城市为每个非国家宗教提供1种食物。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Double [ICON_PRODUCTION] for state [ICON_RELIGION] buildings[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Requires Jungle or Rainforest in city radius
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]国家[ICON_RELIGION]建筑的双倍[ICON_PRODUCTION]

TEXT.English: Graceland
TEXT.Chinese: 恩赐之地

TEXT.English: Harmandir Sahib
TEXT.Chinese: 哈曼迪尔寺

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Motherland Calls[COLOR_REVERT] drafts an unit when a unit of level 3 or higher is lost. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 当3级或更高级别的单位损失时，祖国调用[COLOR_REVERT]绘制一个单位。它也增加了这个城市产生大艺术家的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jetavanaramaya[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional food to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jetavanaramaya[COLOR_REVERT]为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加了额外的食物。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Torre de Belem[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's foreign trade route income. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Torre de Belem[COLOR_REVERT]增加了该市的外贸路线收入。它增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Lubyanka
TEXT.Chinese: 卢比扬卡

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Extra [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] for every Great Person born in a pleased or friendly Civilization
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]为每一个出生在快乐或友好文明中的伟人提供额外的[ICON_GREATPEOPLE]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No open borders required for trade
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]交易无需开放边界

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Another unit is drafted whenever a unit of level 3 or higher is lost
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]当3级或更高级别的单位丢失时，另一个单位被起草

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hubble Space Telescope[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional science to all of your settled satellites. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 哈勃太空望远镜为你的所有卫星增加了额外的科学知识。它还增加了这个城市产生一个伟大科学家的可能性。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]St. Basil's Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] increases the production of all state religion buildings and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣巴兹尔大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]增加了所有国家宗教建筑的产量，增加了该市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Temple of Kukulkan
TEXT.Chinese: 库库尔坎神庙

TEXT.English: Bletchley Park
TEXT.Chinese: 布莱切利园

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]At most 1[ICON_UNHAPPY] from temporary effects
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]临时效果中最多1个[ICON_UNHAPPY]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Technologies cost -25% [ICON_RESEARCH] less in trade and espionage
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]技术成本-减少25% [ICON_RESEARCH]贸易和间谍活动

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monolithic Church[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional commerce to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]整体式教堂[COLOR_REVERT]为您所有的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家增加了额外的商业。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+200% [ICON_RESEARCH] from Great People discoveries
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+200% [ICON_RESEARCH]来自伟大人物的发现

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Neuschwanstein Castle[COLOR_REVERT] restores the Great People Points when settling Great People. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]新天鹅堡[COLOR_REVERT]在安置伟人时恢复伟人积分。它也增加了这个城市产生一个伟大的艺术家的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Salsal Buddha[COLOR_REVERT] allows trade routes to be connected during war. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 萨尔萨佛允许在战争期间连接贸易路线。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Zimbabwe[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra food, production and commerce to all city tiles. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]伟大的津巴布韦[COLOR_REVERT]为所有城市瓷砖增加了额外的食品、生产和商业。它也增加了其城市产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Prambanan
TEXT.Chinese: 巴兰班南

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kremlin[COLOR_REVERT] increases all cities' defenses by 25%% and increases the movement of civilian units by 1. It improves the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]克里姆林宫[COLOR_REVERT]可减少加速生产的花费并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: CERN Research Complex
TEXT.Chinese: 欧洲核子研究中心

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires only flat land in city radius
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]只需要城市半径内的平地

TEXT.English: San Marco Basilica
TEXT.Chinese: 圣马可大教堂

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Double [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] from Buildings
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]建筑物里有两个[ICON_GREATPEOPLE]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Fort[COLOR_REVERT] increases war weariness in the cities of those who go to war against its builder. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 红垒[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]增加了那些与建筑商交战的城市的厌战情绪。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Flavian Amphitheatre
TEXT.Chinese: 弗拉维竞技场

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] converted into [ICON_COMMERCE]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+25%[ICON_PRODUCTION]转换为 [ICON_COMMERCE]

TEXT.English: Abbey Mills
TEXT.Chinese: 阿贝米尔斯排水站

TEXT.English: Great Sphinx
TEXT.Chinese: 狮身人面像

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Saint Sophia's Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] spreads Orthodoxy to all cities you own in Orthodoxy's Core or Historical area upon construction. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣索菲亚大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]为您所有的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]商人[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加额外的食物。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oriental Pearl Tower[COLOR_REVERT] provides 2 science per population in its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: 东方明珠塔[COLRYBUGIONTION ]提供了2人口科学在其城市。它还增加了城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hermitage[COLOR_REVERT] increases science output per culture level of its city and reduces the costs of trading and stealing technologies. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]冬宫[COLOR_REVERT]可使城市的文化产出加倍，并提升其产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_GOLD] from Jewish religious buildings
TEXT.Chinese: 犹太宗教建筑中的[ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_GOLD]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_GOLD] per Peak in City Radius
TEXT.Chinese: 为所在城市范围内的每座山峰[ICON_BULLET]提供2[ICON_GOLD]

TEXT.English: Alamut Fortress
TEXT.Chinese: 阿拉穆特要塞

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Crystal Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's happiness output from using the gold slider and adds additional commerce to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]水晶大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]通过使用金色滑块增加城市的幸福输出，并为所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加额外的商业。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] for every +2[ICON_CULTURE] on buildings in the city
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_COMMERCE]在城市建筑上每+2[ICON_CULTURE]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] on Desert
TEXT.Chinese: 沙漠上的[ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Excess [ICON_HEALTHY] counts as [ICON_HAPPY]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]过量[ICON_HEALTHY]视为[ICON_HAPPY]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cristo Redentor[COLOR_REVERT] allows its builder to switch [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religions[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Civics[COLOR_REVERT] instantly once per turn, with no anarchy. It also increases the chances of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT] appearing.
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]耶稣巨像[COLOR_REVERT]允许每回合改变一次[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]官方信仰[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]内政法令[COLOR_REVERT]，并不会导致无政府状态，还可提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Large Hadron Collider[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the scientific output of its city. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大型强子对撞机[COLOR_REVERT]极大地提高了城市的科学产出。它还增加了这个城市产生一个伟大科学家的机会。

TEXT.English: Las Lajas Sanctuary
TEXT.Chinese: 拉哈斯大教堂

TEXT.English: Large Hadron Collider
TEXT.Chinese: 大型强子对撞机

TEXT.English: Crystal Cathedral
TEXT.Chinese: 水晶大教堂

TEXT.English: Mole Antonelliana
TEXT.Chinese: 安托内利尖塔

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CN Tower[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Tower[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]中央广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Brandenburg Gate
TEXT.Chinese: 勃兰登堡门

TEXT.English: Iron Pillar
TEXT.Chinese: 德里铁柱

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT] grants a culture boost and also limits the amount of great people consumed in a golden age to 3. Its city has an improved chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]埃菲尔铁塔[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市免费获得[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Blue Mosque
TEXT.Chinese: 蓝色清真寺

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Brooklyn Bridge[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Levee[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 布鲁克林大桥[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市都创建了一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]堤坝[COLOR_REVERT]。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_FOOD] for every two excess [ICON_HAPPY]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_FOOD] 每超过两个[ICON_HAPPY]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tsukiji Fish Market[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra food to all water tiles in its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 筑地鱼市[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]为该市的所有水砖添加了额外的食物。它还增加了城市产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Channel Tunnel
TEXT.Chinese: 海峡隧道

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Extra initial production in conquered cities
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]每回合可以强制征召一个额外的单位。

TEXT.English: Lotus Temple
TEXT.Chinese: 莲花寺

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Doubles the revenue limit of all your shrines
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]将所有神龛的收入限制提高一倍

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bell Rock Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] provides a free trade route in all coastal cities. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]贝尔洛克灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]在所有沿海城市提供自由贸易路线。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]United Nations[COLOR_REVERT] triggers [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Diplomatic Victory[COLOR_REVERT] elections. It guarantees that you will be a candidate in those elections and increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]联合国[COLOR_REVERT]用于进行触发[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]外交胜利[COLOR_REVERT]的选举。可确保你作为此项选举的候选者之一，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Sydney Opera House
TEXT.Chinese: 悉尼歌剧院

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Versailles[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estate[COLOR_REVERT] in every city and gives its city two free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]凡尔赛宫[COLOR_REVERT]能减少附近城市的维护费，相当于第二座[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]。并能提升产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires Tundra in city radius[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] per Farm, Paddy Field, Orchard and Plantation resource
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]需要在城市半径范围内的苔原[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH]每个农场、稻田、果园和种植园资源

TEXT.English: Terracotta Army
TEXT.Chinese: 兵马俑

TEXT.English: The Temple of Artemis
TEXT.Chinese: 阿耳特弥斯神庙

TEXT.English: The Great Mausoleum
TEXT.Chinese: 毛索洛斯王陵墓

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Cothon[COLOR_REVERT] add a bonus production to every water tile worked by its city. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]巨港[COLOR_REVERT]增加了奖金生产的每一个水瓷砖工作的城市。它增加了城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Himeji Castle
TEXT.Chinese: 姬路城

TEXT.English: Old Synagogue
TEXT.Chinese: 旧犹太会堂

TEXT.English: Gardens by the Bay
TEXT.Chinese: 滨海湾花园

TEXT.English: Sagrada Familia
TEXT.Chinese: 圣家族大教堂

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Cities continue to grow when using Food for Production
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]城市在使用粮食生产时继续增长

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Graceland[COLOR_REVERT] grants a culture boost and provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will create a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]格雷斯兰[COLOR_REVERT]提供文化提升，并为您的文明提供七个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门单曲[COLOR_REVERT]资源（它们提供快乐）。它增加了这个城市创造出一个伟大的艺术家的可能性。

TEXT.English: Topkapi Palace
TEXT.Chinese: 托普卡帕宫

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires Jungle or Rainforest in city radius
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]城市半径范围内需要丛林或雨林

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT] reduces civic maintenance costs. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]故宫[COLOR_REVERT]降低了城市维护成本。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]City defense increases culture output in all cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_CULTURE] per level of every fully fortified unit in the city
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]新建的肉搏单位以及投射单位自带城防一级和操练一级[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]所有掠夺所获的[ICON_GOLD]增加一倍

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+50% chance to avoid spy detection[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+50% chance to detect enemy spies
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+50%几率避免间谍侦测[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+50%几率侦测敌人间谍

TEXT.English: Brooklyn Bridge
TEXT.Chinese: 布鲁克林大桥

TEXT.English: The Empire State Building
TEXT.Chinese: 帝国大厦

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Settling a Great Person restores 25% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]安置伟人恢复25%[ICON_GREATPEOPLE]

TEXT.English: The Motherland Calls
TEXT.Chinese: 祖国母亲在呼唤

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] in every coastal city and provides two free trade routes in its city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有海滨城市额外增加两条商路。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Reduced enemy movement speed within the walls[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Barbarian units take damage within the walls
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]降低敌人在墙内的移动速度[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]野蛮单位在墙内受到伤害

TEXT.English: Chapultepec Castle
TEXT.Chinese: 查普尔特佩克城堡

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Delta Works[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra food, production and commerce to all water tiles worked by its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]三角洲工厂[COLOR_REVERT]为其所在城市生产的所有水砖增加了额外的食物、生产和商业。它还增加了城市产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Triumphal Arch[COLOR_REVERT] completely heals your units when they are promoted. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR U BUILDING U TEXT]凯旋门[COLOR U REVERT]在你的单位提升时完全治愈它们。它还增加了这个城市产生一位伟大政治家的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Skytree[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional production to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] and food to all your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天空树[COLOR_REVERT]为您所有的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]科学家[COLOR_REVERT]和食物添加了额外的产品给您所有的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]工程师[COLOR_REVERT]专家。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shwedagon Paya[COLOR_REVERT] doubles the construction speed of the buildings of your state religion. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]瑞光大金塔[COLOR_REVERT]可对所在文明启用所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]宗教信仰[COLOR_REVERT]类内政法令，还可提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。

TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纳兰达大学[COLOR_REVERT]为你所在国宗教的所有建筑增加了额外的科学知识。它也增加了这个城市产生一个伟大科学家的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taj Mahal[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]泰姬陵[COLOR_REVERT]可立即触发本文明的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]黄金时代[COLOR_REVERT]。并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.Chinese: 克久拉霍

TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]艺术家也可以使用牧师槽雇佣

TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]获得每个殖民地的[ICON_GOLD]

TEXT.English: [TAB]Maussollos died in 349 BC. King of Caria during his lifetime, Maussollos wished to leave a reminder of himself for future generations in the form of a great tomb. In addition to hiring hundreds of laborers, Maussollos commissioned five of the finest artisans in the Hellenic world to design the hundreds of statues that were to line the peripheries of his white marble resting place.[PARAGRAPH:1]Over 130 feet tall upon completion, the Mausoleum of Maussollos stood by the harbor of Halicarnassus until 1522, when the Knights Hospitaller tore it down in order to use the stones to build defenses against the approaching Turks.
TEXT.Chinese: 莫索罗斯死于公元前349年。在卡里亚国王的有生之年，毛索罗斯希望以一座巨大的坟墓的形式为后人留下一个纪念自己的东西。除了雇佣数百名劳工外，毛索罗斯还委托了希腊世界五位最优秀的工匠设计了数百尊雕像，这些雕像将排列在他白色大理石安息地的外围[段落：1]陵墓竣工后高130英尺，一直矗立在哈利卡纳萨斯港，直到1522年，当骑士Hospitaller为了用石头来防御突厥而把它拆掉。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Global Seed Vault[COLOR_REVERT] provides science for each available Farm, Paddy Field, Orchard and Plantation resource. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires Desert in city radius[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Desert tiles worked by the city yield at least 2[ICON_FOOD] and 2[ICON_COMMERCE]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]需要城市半径内的沙漠[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]城市制作的沙漠瓷砖至少产生2个[ICON_FOOD]和2个[ICON_COMMERCE]
建筑

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_RESEARCH] per city population
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_RESEARCH]每个城市人口

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] per Nuclear Weapon built in the world
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH]每个世界制造的核武器

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Notre Dame[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the mumber of temples required to build Cathedrals to three. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣母院[COLOR_REVERT]提升同一大陆所有城市的快乐度。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Channel Tunnel[COLOR_REVERT] increases the yield of all trade routes with civilizations with friendly relations. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]通道隧道[COLOR_REVERT]增加了与友好文明的所有贸易路线的产量。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The Bourse
TEXT.Chinese: 交易所

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Guadalupe Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] produces one gold each turn for every city on the continent of its city that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]瓜达卢佩大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]为该城市大陆上每一个信奉[COLOR_REVERT]天主教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市每转产生一枚金币。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Berlaymont
TEXT.Chinese: 欧盟总部大厦

TEXT.English: Our settlers and conquistadors in the New World have acquired an additional %d1 [ICON_GOLD] from the new colony of %s2.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们在新大陆的定居者和征服者从新殖民地%s2获得了额外的%d1[ICON_GOLD]。

TEXT.English: Dome of the Rock
TEXT.Chinese: 圆顶清真寺

TEXT.English: The Louvre
TEXT.Chinese: 卢浮宫

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossus[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all water tiles in its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]青铜巨像[COLOR_REVERT]可使本国海滨城市的水域额外增加一个单位的商业产出。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Palace of Nations
TEXT.Chinese: 万国宫

TEXT.English: Burj Khalifa
TEXT.Chinese: 哈利法塔

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] removes the unhealthiness of all Flood Plains in all cities. It increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]消除了所有城市所有洪泛平原的不健康。它增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Crystal Palace[COLOR_REVERT] gives its city two free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]水晶宫[COLOR戋REVERT]为该市提供两名免费的[COLOR戋u HIGHLIGHT戋TEXT]工程师[COLOR戋REVERT]专家。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gur-e-Amir[COLOR_REVERT] provides culture in its city when conquering cities. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 当征服城市时，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]古尔埃米尔[COLOR_REVERT]为城市提供了文化。它也增加了这个城市产生一个伟大的艺术家的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Food is added to Production when building Wonders
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]创造奇迹时，食物被添加到生产中

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+50% building speed for Railroads
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+50%铁路建设速度

TEXT.English: Salsal Buddha
TEXT.Chinese: 巴米扬大佛

TEXT.English: Global Seed Vault
TEXT.Chinese: 国际种子库

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Potala Palace[COLOR_REVERT] provides a Great People point for every hill tile in the city radius. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]布达拉宫[COLOR_REVERT]为城市半径内的每一个丘陵地块提供一个伟人点数。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires a naval unit of level three or higher
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]需要一个三级及以上晋升的海军单位

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Silver Tree Fountain[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free Great Person when a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] is born. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银树喷泉[COLOR_REVERT]在[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大将军[COLOR_REVERT]诞生时创造了一个额外的伟人。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]El Escorial[COLOR_REVERT] provides gold for every acquired colony. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]El Escorial[COLOR_REVERT]为每个获得的殖民地提供黄金。它还增加了这个城市产生一位伟大政治家的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Floating Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] give a large food bonus as well as increasing its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 沿河地段提供粮食。

TEXT.English: World Trade Center
TEXT.Chinese: 世界贸易中心

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Empire State Building[COLOR_REVERT] provides a gold bonus equal to the population of the city in which it's built. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: 帝国大厦[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]提供了相当于其所在城市人口的黄金奖励。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hollywood[COLOR_REVERT] grants a culture boost and provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]好莱坞[COLOR_REVERT]可为你的文明提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]卖座电影[COLOR_REVERT]资源（增加快乐度）。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Another great person is born whenever a Great General appears
TEXT.Chinese: 当一个大将军出现时，获得额外的伟人

TEXT.English: Torre de Belem
TEXT.Chinese: 贝伦塔

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional espionage to all buildings of your state religion. It also increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣索菲亚[COLOR_REVERT]可使你的工人效率更高，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] per power consumed in all cities
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] 所有城市每消耗一次电力

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wat Preah Pisnulok[COLOR_REVERT] adds an additional population point in all cities and adds additional food to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wat Preah Pisnulok[COLOR_REVERT]在所有城市增加了一个额外的人口点，并为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加了额外的食物。它增加了它的城市产生一个伟大预言家的几率。

TEXT.English: Porcelain Tower
TEXT.Chinese: 大报恩寺

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gondeshapur[COLOR_REVERT] gives all eligible units built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medic I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and adds additional food to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]冈德沙普[COLOR_REVERT]为本市所有符合条件的建筑单位提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medic I[COLOR_REVERT]促销，并为所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]科学家[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加额外食物。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Great general threshold is reset when one of your generals dies in battle
TEXT.Chinese: 当你的一个将军在战斗中牺牲时，伟大的将军门槛将被重置

TEXT.English: Theodosian Walls
TEXT.Chinese: 狄奥多西城墙

TEXT.English: Salt Cathedral
TEXT.Chinese: 盐城大教堂

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Iron Dome[COLOR_REVERT] increases the interception chance in your own territory. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR U BUILDING U TEXT]铁穹顶[COLOR U REVERT]增加在你自己领地的拦截几率。它还增加了这个城市产生一个伟大科学家的机会。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Las Lajas Sanctuary[COLOR_REVERT] increases unit heal reate in all cities. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]拉斯拉哈斯圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]增加所有城市的单位治疗效果。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Cheomseongdae
TEXT.Chinese: 瞻星台

TEXT.English: Bell Rock Lighthouse
TEXT.Chinese: 贝尔礁灯塔

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires Oasis in city radius
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]需要城市半径内的绿洲

TEXT.English: Tsukiji Fish Market
TEXT.Chinese: 筑地鱼市场

TEXT.English: Saint Thomas Church
TEXT.Chinese: 圣托马斯教堂

TEXT.English: Ishtar Gate
TEXT.Chinese: 伊什塔尔城门

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nobel Prize[COLOR_REVERT] provides Great People Points when a Great Person is born in a civilization with pleased or friendly relations. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 当一个伟大的人出生在一个有着愉快或友好关系的文明中时，诺贝尔奖[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]为伟大的人提供了分数。它还增加了这个城市产生一位伟大政治家的机会。

TEXT.English: Nalanda University
TEXT.Chinese: 那烂陀大学

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Defeated city defenders retreat to your capital
TEXT.Chinese: 被击败的城市防御者撤退到你的首都

TEXT.English: Delta Works
TEXT.Chinese: 三角洲工程

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palace of Nations[COLOR_REVERT] defends your cities from being demanded in Congress and other civilizations are more willing to approve your demands in Congress. It makes Congresses occur every four turns. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]国家宫殿[COLOR_REVERT]保护你的城市不被国会要求，其他文明更愿意在国会批准你的要求。它使国会每四个回合举行一次。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mount Athos[COLOR_REVERT] doubles the Great People Points from all buildings. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿索斯山[COLOR_REVERT]使所有建筑的伟大人物点数加倍。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sagrada Familia[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional production to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and increases the efficiency of building commerce. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣家族大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加额外的产品，并提高建筑商业的效率。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Guadalupe Basilica
TEXT.Chinese: 瓜达卢佩大教堂

TEXT.English: La Mezquita
TEXT.Chinese: 科尔多瓦清真寺

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Wall[COLOR_REVERT] reduces enemy speed within your borders and also damages barbarians within your borders. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]长城[COLOR_REVERT]的作用范围覆盖文明的整个文化疆界，即包括地图上位于长城以外的国土。长城可使[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]蛮族[COLOR_REVERT]无法进入文明的领地，还能使在文明领地内进行的战斗带来更多的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]大军事家[COLOR_REVERT]点数。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Artemis[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's trade route income and gives a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿尔忒弥斯神庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市商路的收益，并为所在城市免费提供一位[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]神学家[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Congresses occur every four turns[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your cities cannot be demanded in Congress[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Other civilizations are more willing to approve your demands in Congress
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]大会每四个回合举行一次[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]你的城市不能在国会被要求[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]其他文明更愿意在国会批准你的要求

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Topkapi Palace[COLOR_REVERT] grants extra initial production in the conquered city. It also increase their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 托普卡皮宫殿[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]在被征服的城市中额外提供初始制作。这也增加了他们城市产生一个伟大政治家的机会。

TEXT.English: Jetavanaramaya
TEXT.Chinese: 祗陀林佛塔

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grand Canal[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all river tiles worked by its city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 沿河地段的商业产值增加。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Berlaymont[COLOR_REVERT] increases the limit of defensive pacts you can sign and provides provides 1 free specialist per signed defensive pact. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Berlaymont[COLOR_REVERT]增加你可以签署的防御协议的限制，并为每个签署的防御协议提供1名免费专家。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All cities store an additional 25% [ICON_FOOD] after growth
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]所有城市在增长后都会额外存储25%的[ICON_FOOD]

TEXT.English: Harbour Opera
TEXT.Chinese: 悉尼歌剧院

TEXT.English: Iron Dome
TEXT.Chinese: 铁穹防御系统

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Emerald Buddha Temple[COLOR_REVERT] removes all unhappiness from the city in which it is built. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 翡翠佛寺[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]消除了它所在城市的所有不快。它增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Dujiangyan
TEXT.Chinese: 都江堰

TEXT.English: St. Basil's Cathedral
TEXT.Chinese: 圣巴兹尔大教堂

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dujiangyan[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra food to all river tiles worked by its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]都江堰[COLOR_REVERT]为都江堰市生产的所有河砖添加了额外的食物。这也增加了该市产生一位伟大政治家的几率。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All units built in cities with state religion receive +2 experience
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]所有在有国教城市建设的单位获得+2经验

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Burj Khalifa[COLOR_REVERT] increases the food and commerce yield of desert tiles. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]哈利法塔[COLOR_REVERT]增加沙漠瓷砖的食品和商业产量。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+50% healing when units are promoted
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+单位提升时50%治疗

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pyramid of the Sun[COLOR_REVERT] reduces by 1 the number of Great People required to start a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT]. It improves the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 太阳金字塔

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Moai Statues[COLOR_REVERT] add bonus production to all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]High Sea Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whaling Boats[COLOR_REVERT] in your civilization. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]摩艾石像群[COLOR_REVERT]使所在城市的每片水域额外增加1单位产能。并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gardens by the Bay[COLOR_REVERT] provides commerce for excess health in its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 海湾[COLOR_REVERT]的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]花园为其城市的过度健康提供了商业机会。它还增加了这个城市创造出一个伟大的艺术家的可能性。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bletchley Park[COLOR_REVERT] decreases the change your spies are being detected and increases the chance to detect enemy spies. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]布莱奇利公园[COLOR_REVERT]减少你的间谍被侦测到的变化，增加侦测敌人间谍的机会。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Santa Maria del Fiore[COLOR_REVERT] increases the rate of its city Great People points. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]花之圣母大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]提高了其城市伟人积分的比率。它也增加了这个城市产生一个伟大的艺术家的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Porcelain Tower[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional food to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and removes the open border requirement for trade routes. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]瓷塔[COLOR_REVERT]为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政治家[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加了额外的食物，并取消了贸易路线的开放边界要求。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Cannot be built on the same continent as the Catholic Shrine[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_GOLD] per Catholic city on the same continent
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]不能建在同一个大陆上的天主教圣地[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_GOLD]每个天主教城市在同一个大陆上

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages consume at most three Great People
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]黄金时代最多消耗三个伟人

TEXT.English: House of Wisdom
TEXT.Chinese: 智慧宫

TEXT.English: Aqua Appia
TEXT.Chinese: 阿庇乌水渠

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Mausoleum[COLOR_REVERT] increases the length of your Golden Ages by fifty percent. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大陵墓[COLOR_REVERT]增加您的黄金时期的长度百分之五十。它还增加了其城市产生一个伟大的艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Atomium[COLOR_REVERT] increases the scientific output of its city per Nuclear Weapon in the world. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]原子[COLOR_REVERT]增加了其城市每一核武器在世界上的科学产出。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Image of the World Square[COLOR_REVERT] provides 1 trade route per culture level of its city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 世界广场的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]图像[COLOR_REVERT]为其所在城市的每个文化级别提供一条贸易路线。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Borobudur[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to hire three [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and adds additional production to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Borobudur[COLOR_REVERT]允许您雇佣三名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家，并为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加额外产品。它也增加了它的城市产生一个伟大预言家的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sydney Opera House[COLOR_REVERT] increases the happiness per culture level in all cities and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]悉尼歌剧院[COLOR_REVERT]提高了所有城市每种文化水平的幸福感，并增加了其城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: After the defeat of our %s1 another unit has been drafted in %s2 to defend the motherland!
TEXT.Chinese: 在我们的%s1失败后，在%s2中又征召了一支保卫祖国的部队！

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] gives all cities in your civilization one free specialist. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]自由女神像[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市免费获得一位专业人员。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trafalgar Square[COLOR_REVERT] enables ships to be built much faster and the ships start off with additional experience points. It also increase its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 海军建造速度加快，所在城市建造的海军单位获得额外的经验值。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to hire one specialist of each type. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]伊什塔尔门[COLOR_REVERT]允许您雇用每种类型的专家。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Machu Picchu
TEXT.Chinese: 马丘比丘

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University of Sankore[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all desert tiles for all cities. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 如果你确立了官方信仰，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]桑科雷大学[COLOR_REVERT]可使本文明所有宗教建筑提供额外科研点数。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Khajuraho[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional food to all buildings of your state religion. It also increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]卡朱拉霍[COLOR_REVERT]为你所在国宗教的所有建筑添加额外的食物。它也增加了这个城市产生一个伟大预言家的机会。

TEXT.English: ITER
TEXT.Chinese: 国际热核聚变实验堆

TEXT.English: Vijaya Stambha
TEXT.Chinese: 印度维贾亚纪念碑

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_COMMERCE] per excess [ICON_HEALTHY]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_COMMERCE] 每超出[ICON_HEALTHY]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Vijaya Stambha[COLOR_REVERT] gives all eligible units built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]City Garrison I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and increases [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] emergence. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度维贾亚纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]为本市所有符合条件的建筑单位提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]城市卫戍I[COLOR_REVERT]升级，并增加[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大将[COLOR_REVERT]出现。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Louvre[COLOR_REVERT] gives its city two free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and provides culture for each controlled Great Wonder. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 卢浮宫[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]为其城市提供了两位免费的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]专家，并为每一个受控制的伟大奇迹提供文化。它也增加了这个城市产生一个伟大的艺术家的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT] allows wonders to be produces with food. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]狮身人面像[COLOR_REVERT]允许用食物创造奇迹。它增加了这个城市产生一个伟大预言家的几率。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Civic Upkeep Reduced by 33%
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]城市维护费减少33%

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]ITER[COLOR_REVERT] provides clean power to all cities on the same continent and provides commerce for all consumed power in all cities. It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]ITER[COLOR_REVERT]为同一大陆上的所有城市提供清洁电力，并为所有城市的所有消耗电力提供商业。它增加了它的城市产生一个伟大科学家的可能性。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No City Resistance on Conquest
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]征服时没有城市抵抗

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2 possible defensive pacts[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 free specialist per defensive pact
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+2个可能的防御协议[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+每个防御协议1个免费专家

TEXT.English: Al Khazneh
TEXT.Chinese: 佩特拉古城

TEXT.English: Silver Tree Fountain
TEXT.Chinese: 银树喷泉

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amber Room[COLOR_REVERT] increases the willingness of other civilizations to enter into defensive pact and shares golden ages with defensive pact partners. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]琥珀屋[COLOR_REVERT]增加了其他文明加入防御契约的意愿，并与防御契约伙伴共享黄金时代。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Itaipu Dam[COLOR_REVERT] provides clean power to all cities on the same continent. It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]三峡大坝[COLOR_REVERT]为同一大陆上的所有城市提供清洁能源。它增加了它的城市将产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大的工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dome of the Rock[COLOR_REVERT] provides one free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and doubles the Shrine gold limit from 20 to 40. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 岩石的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圆顶[COLOR_REVERT]提供一名免费的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家，并将神龛黄金限制从20倍增加到40倍。它增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Unlimited experience from Barbarian Units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Victories against Barbarians contribute to Great General birth
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]对野蛮人战斗获得经验不再有上限[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]对野蛮人战斗获得经验可计入大军事家点数

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]La Mezquita[COLOR_REVERT] gives 2 free specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]拉梅兹基塔[COLOR_REVERT]提供2名免费专家。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Only three Temples required to build Cathedrals
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]建造大教堂只需要三座寺庙

TEXT.English: CN Tower
TEXT.Chinese: 加拿大国家电视塔

TEXT.English: Santa Maria del Fiore
TEXT.Chinese: 花之圣母大教堂

TEXT.English: Borobudur
TEXT.Chinese: 婆罗浮屠

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Other civilization are more willing to enter into defensive pacts[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Shares golden ages of defensive pact partners
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]其他文明更愿意加入防御条约[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]分享防御条约伙伴的黄金时代

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_HAPPY] per Culture Level in All Cities
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]在所有城市，每个文化级别的+1快乐[ICON_HAPPY]

TEXT.English: Trafalgar Square
TEXT.Chinese: 特拉法加广场

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]House of Wisdom[COLOR_REVERT] increases the research boost from Great People discoveries. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]智慧之家[COLOR_REVERT]增加了伟人发现的研究推动。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Westminster Palace
TEXT.Chinese: 威斯敏斯特宫

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All city tiles: +1[ICON_FOOD], +1[ICON_PRODUCTION], +1[ICON_COMMERCE]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]所有城市地块: +1[ICON_FOOD], +1[ICON_PRODUCTION], +1[ICON_COMMERCE]

TEXT.English: Monolithic Church
TEXT.Chinese: 拉利贝拉岩石教堂

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mt. Rushmore[COLOR_REVERT] decreases war weariness in all cities in your civilization and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]总统山[COLOR_REVERT]可减少所有本国城市的厌战情绪，并提升该城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Atomium
TEXT.Chinese: 原子塔

TEXT.English: The Hanging Gardens
TEXT.Chinese: 空中花园

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages require one fewer Great Person
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]开启黄金时代消耗伟人数-1

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mole Antonelliana[COLOR_REVERT] provides 2 production for every [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Peak[COLOR_REVERT] in the city radius. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]安托内利尖塔[COLOR_REVERT]为城市半径内的每个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]峰值[COLOR_REVERT]提供2个产品。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: A nobel prize has been awarded to the %s1 Great Person %s2 in %s3, adding %d4 [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]
TEXT.Chinese: 诺贝尔奖授予了%s3中的%s1伟人%s2，增加了%d4[偶像伟人]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Space Elevator[COLOR_REVERT] increases spaceship part production in all of your cities and produces commerce for every constructed satellite and space project. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天梯[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市建造太空飞船组件的速度+50%%，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oxford University[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional science to all of your specialists. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]牛津大学[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升所在城市的科研能力。并允许你供养三位科学家，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Blue Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] limits the unhappiness from temporary effects. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 蓝色清真寺[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]限制了临时效果带来的不快。它也增加了这个城市产生一个伟大的艺术家的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pentagon[COLOR_REVERT] grants experience points to troops built in all cities and increases the chance that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 一旦建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]五角大楼[COLOR_REVERT]，你所有新组建的单位将获得两个初始经验点。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Marco Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional gold to all of your specialists. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 圣马可大教堂为您的所有专家添加了额外的黄金。它还增加了城市产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Trade routes remain connected even during war
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]即使在战争期间，贸易路线仍然保持联系

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Itsukushima Shrine[COLOR_REVERT] provides a Great People point for every water tile in the city radius. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Itsukushima神龛[COLOR_REVERT]为城市半径内的每一块水砖提供了一个绝佳的人民点。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Krak des Chevaliers[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castle[COLOR_REVERT] in every city and moves defeated city defenders to your capital. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]骑士堡[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]，并将被击败的城市防御者转移到你的首都。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Crystal Palace
TEXT.Chinese: 水晶宫

TEXT.English: Apadana Palace
TEXT.Chinese: 阿帕达纳宫

TEXT.English: Golden Gate Bridge
TEXT.Chinese: 金门大桥

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Prambanan[COLOR_REVERT] lets all your cities store extra food after growth. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Prambanan[COLOR_REVERT]让您的所有城市在增长后存储额外的食物。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] gives its city two free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]可使所在城市免费供养两位科学家，提升城市的科研能力。并能大大提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Wat Preah Pisnulok
TEXT.Chinese: 吴哥窟

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] for every [LINK=literal]Satellite[\LINK] constructed[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+5[ICON_COMMERCE] for every space project completed
TEXT.Chinese: 只能在赤道附近建造

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wembley[COLOR_REVERT] grants a culture boost and provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Event[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]温布利[COLOR_REVERT]提供文化提升，并为您的文明提供七个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门足球赛事[COLOR_REVERT]资源（提供快乐）。它增加了它的城市将产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大的艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oracle[COLOR_REVERT] gives two free technologies of your current or previous era. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神谕宣示所[COLOR_REVERT]可使建造者免费获得两项科技，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Apadana Palace[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT] in every city and causes your workers to build improvements faster. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿帕达纳宫殿[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建了一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]，并使您的工人更快地进行改进。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Potala Palace
TEXT.Chinese: 布达拉宫

TEXT.English: Saint Sophia's Cathedral
TEXT.Chinese: 基辅圣索菲亚大教堂

TEXT.English: Itaipu Dam
TEXT.Chinese: 伊泰普大坝

TEXT.English: Shalimar Gardens
TEXT.Chinese: 沙利玛花园

TEXT.English: The Red Fort
TEXT.Chinese: 阿格拉红堡

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cheomseongdae[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's happiness output from using the science slider. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cheomseongdae[COLOR_REVERT]使用科学滑块增加城市的幸福输出。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: Amber Room
TEXT.Chinese: 琥珀宫

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abbey Mills[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sewer[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院磨坊[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]下水道[COLOR_REVERT]。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] per Hill in city radius
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_GREATPEOPLE]在城市半径内的每座山

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sistine Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] causes each specialist in every city to generate culture and increases the culture bonus provided by buildings of your state religion. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]使城市中的每位专业人员都能提供文化产出，并增加宗教建筑的文化产出。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]具有极高的文化值，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The Grand Canal
TEXT.Chinese: 大运河

TEXT.English: 太阳门
TEXT.Chinese: 太阳门
